DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy of Dovitinib for Squamous NSCLC.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study of Dovitinib for FGFR1 Amplified Squamous Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: histologically confirmed squamous NSCLC Previously treated with one or two lines of chemotherapy FGFR amplification (FISH > 5 copies of genes) 20 years or older ECOG PS 02 active infection uncontrolled brain metastasis unstable angina or MI
